items.sentence: The mountain path was under a blanket of leaves, soft and easy to walk on.
Tom woke up when the piece of chalk that the teacher threw at him hit him.
I felt the need to do that, even though everyone said it wasn't necessary.
Just because it's in Tatoeba.org's database, doesn't mean it's a sentence.
Tom gets annoyed when Mary straightens up his towel after he's hung it up.
Tom was a slow learner when he was a child, and attended a special school.
I'll set my alarm clock so I get up early enough to catch the first train.
I'll set an alarm for 2:30 to remind me to go pick Tom up at the bus stop.
Tom's son was born in Australia, and his daughter was born in New Zealand.
I wonder why we get wetter when we run in the rain than when we just walk.
